mapper.sql: id ,name ,description updated_time as updatedTime, created_time as createdTime
mapper.delete: delete from arrange where id in #{item}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.description, c.begin_time as beginTime, c.end_time as endTime, a.updated_time as updatedTime, a.created_time as createdTime from arrange a left join class c on a.id = c.arrange_id where c.id = #{classId}

select id, name, description, updated_time as updatedTime, created_time as createdTime from arrange where 1=1
and (name like '%${param}%')
order by id DESC
